title: Stressful jobs are associated with a higher risk of heart rhythm disorders

title_detail.value: Stressful jobs are associated with a higher risk of heart rhythm disorders

summary: Having a stressful job is associated with a higher risk of a heart rhythm disorder called atrial fibrillation, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Having a stressful job is associated with a higher risk of a heart rhythm disorder called atrial fibrillation, according to new research.
